Topic.Title: Error Message When Creating A Game

Posts.EditableText:
Hi! 

I'm getting an error when I try to create a game. 

Just some helpful information, I am using android, not windows, and declined to download the windows app.
Posts.HTML:
Hi!

I'm getting an error when I try to create a game.

Just some helpful information, I am using android, not windows, and declined to download the windows app.

Posts.EditableText:
Is it the same error message the same as the one shown in the other threads recently posted?

If you're trying to create a new game on the online version of Quest, make sure the address starts with `https://` rather than `http://`. You cannot create a new game unless you are connected securely.

But for future reference, error messages mean something. If you tell us what the error is, it is much more likely that the answer you get will be for the right problem.
